entry.title: WSJ Reporter's Detention Spotlights the Rise of Arrests by Authoritarian Regimes
entry.content: The Evan Gershkovich case reflects a growing practice in which Americans are arrested to obtain concessions from the U.S.

entry.title: As Ukraine Readies Counteroffensive, Russia Steps Up Campaign Against Partisans
entry.content: Russia is deepening a crackdown on dissent in occupied areas of Ukraine, the Ukrainian military said, as Kyiv’s forces launched fresh attacks aimed at weakening Moscow’s hold in the south.

entry.title: In a Civilian Hospital, Military Medicine Is Kept Alive
entry.content: Army doctors and medics practice skills and relay combat lessons to trauma units.
